project.description: Synchronise git repositories’ “master” branch between the ⮡ tarent-internal gitlab copy and the master on evolvis.org

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
timeout --kill-after=20m 18m sh -c '
set +ex echo >&2 "I: preparing…" rv=0 git remote remove evolvis 2>/dev/null echo >&2 "I: fetching from Evolvis…" if ! git remote add -f evolvis git+ssh://maven@evolvis.org/scmrepos/git/veraweb/veraweb.git; then echo >&2 "E: cannot fetch from evolvis" exit 1 fi echo >&2 "I: merging from Evolvis…" if ! git merge --ff-only evolvis/master; then echo >&2 "E: cannot ff-merge evolvis master; resolve manually!" exit 1 fi echo >&2 "I: preparing…" git remote remove gitlab 2>/dev/null echo >&2 "I: fetching from Gitlab…" if ! git remote add -f gitlab git@gitlab.tarent.de:veraweb-int/veraweb.git; then echo >&2 "E: cannot fetch from gitlab" exit 1 fi echo >&2 "I: merging from Gitlab…" if ! git merge --ff-only gitlab/master; then echo >&2 "E: cannot ff-merge gitlab master, WTF?" exit 1 fi echo >&2 "I: pushing to Gitlab…" if ! git push gitlab master; then echo >&2 "E: cannot push to gitlab; resolve manually!" rv=$(($rv+1)) fi echo >&2 "I: pushing to Evolvis…" if ! git push evolvis master; then echo >&2 "E: cannot push to evolvis; resolve manually!" rv=$(($rv+1)) fi echo >&2 "I: all done" exit $rv
: end of script run under timeout'
